dict.acceptation: <医>传染，感染；传染病，染毒物；影响；

sent.orig: The infection rate of ascaris lumbricoides was one of the highest in parasitosis infection.
sent.trans: 蛔虫感染是人体寄生虫感染中较高的一种。

sent.orig: In general, mixed infection was the main type infection seen clinically.
sent.trans: 临床上一般以混合感染为主。

sent.orig: RS infection usually manifests as an upper respiratory tract infection with symptoms resembling a cold.
sent.trans: RS感染通常表现为上呼吸道感染症状，与感冒相似。

sent.orig: Along with the bone damage, there is a risk of infection infection the open wound.
sent.trans: 在骨头损坏的同时，还存有裂开伤口感染的危险。

sent.orig: Infection, especially anaerobic infection, is much more apt to occur.
sent.trans: 感染，特别是厌氧感染很容易发生。
